Optimization for Machine Learning

This document presents rst order optimization methods and their applications to machine learning, focusing on cheap methods that can scale to large datasets and models with lots of parameters. The course covers basic theoretical properties of optimization problems, gradient descent, stochastic gradient method, automatic differentiation, shallow and deep networks.

Key Concepts:

  • rst order optimization methods
  • unconstrained optimization
  • regression
  • classification
  • convexity
  • Reverse Mode of Automatic Differentiation
  • Feed-Forward Compositions
  • Feed-Forward Architecture
  • Recurrent Architectures
  • Unconstrained Optimization
